extendedInfo.description: Quicker lets you put frequently used settings and shortcuts into a single place and access them from there quickly. It extends standard stock settings with better volume and brightness controls, as well as free memory indicators. Built in screen and LED flashlight make it even more useful.Join our Google+ community: http://goo.gl/QGiMgTerms of use: http://goo.gl/2dIkGSwitches: - Brightness (w/ Screen Dimmer for convenient usage of the phone in the darkness) - Ringer mode - Volume streams - Bluetooth - Wi-Fi - Portable Wi-Fi Hotspot* - GPS** - Mobile Data** - Call settings - Auto-sync - Screen timeout - Airplane mode - Auto rotation - Screen lock patternIndicators: - Battery - Free memory (internal, external) - App cache - Digital clockTools: - System shortcuts - Application shortcuts - Flashlight (screen and LED)***Others: - Battery indicator in status bar - Settings backup (configure once and restore at any time later) - Quick launch via status bar shortcut or by long-pressing hardware "search" buttonQuicker uses following permissions: - "Storage" for backup / restore feature - "GPS location" for switching GPS on/off (see **) - "Take picture & video" for LED flashlight - "Directly call" for the shortcut widget when you adding a direct call shortcut - "Reading log data" for being able to report issues - "System tools" permissions for changing various system settingsQuicker uses these permissions for the purposes listed above only.*) Not available for some Android version and phones**) Direct switch is available for some Android versions and phones ***) LED flashlight might not be compatible to some phonesFAQ:- Can Quicker launch after phone restart? Yes, just install it to the phone memory (not SD card)- Why Brightness switch does not work? If you have a SwipePad running, then it can interfere with this function on Android 4.0 or higher devices.NOTE 1: Although Quicker does its best to switch Mobile Data, GPS and WiFi Hotspot with a single click, there are devices / Android versions where these settings cannot be switched directly. In such cases shortcuts to stock settings are available only.NOTE 2:Why no direct switch? Because Android security model does not allow installed applications to change secure system parameters. This is done to protect users from malicious application that can misuse those parameters otherwise.

reviews.title: Start up
reviews.comment: Would love if it automatically would start up as soon as the phone reboots. Keep forgetting to turn it back on, please add that feature.
reviews.author: iiCUBE OiD

reviews.title: Great Application!!!!
reviews.comment: I have always used quicker for every smart phone I\'ve owned. And over the years I think a few minor improvements are needed. But without them it\'d still a great app. Like the transitions between the screens are too slow. It\'d be great if you could have control over that option. Adding a snappyness to it wouldn\'t be bad either. It\'d be badass to add actual widgets, but I don\'t think that\'s a possibility. Lastly, if you could make the application launch through the home swipe feature instead of google now.
reviews.author: Brian Chee

reviews.title: Everything Quick Settings plus
reviews.comment: Faster, returns as soon as you set something, plus can launch arbitrary apps. Was glad I bought it, even though ICS added settings from notifier, and JB added quick settings, this is still better control and faster.  I still use it very often on both my nexus gizmos, it\'s faster, and easier to find things I commonly want.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful.
reviews.comment: Using nova launcher, double tap on the.home screen and the app opens.
reviews.author: meletios meletiou

reviews.title: Convenient & Reliable
reviews.comment: Please allow larger grid sizes than 3x5 (4x5 is a good start)! Thank you!
reviews.author: Kevin Chan

reviews.title: Very useful app
reviews.comment: Just needs a less ice cream sandwich look now, go Jellybean!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: All the things that make it easy.
reviews.author: Robyn Pittillo

reviews.title: Ugly background
reviews.comment: Need custom background or no background option. Sync toggle only turned off auto sync but not background sync.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This app is incredible. Great enhancement to jelly bean toggles.
reviews.author: Kamal Hussain

reviews.title: Must have tool
reviews.comment: Great software for each Android device. Pretty flexible and configurable. Looking forward to see other great features. Screen dimmer is a good new one, especially useful for reading at night.
reviews.author: Anatoliy Kaverin

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great tool, perfect even for nexus 4 with Android 4.2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Should be on every phone!
reviews.comment: Best app on the market. I use brightness everywhere I go. Inside, outside everywhere all day. So having it in the notification bar it makes it so easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple - settings at your fingertips
reviews.comment: The way it was meant to be.
reviews.author: Edward Persaud

reviews.title: thanks
reviews.comment: long-term user of quick settings.
reviews.author: lalo lalouve

reviews.title: Galaxy Nexus 4.2
reviews.comment: Very good app... but it force closes when I attempt to lower screen brightness levels to below the normal Android minimum. only started happening since the update to 4.2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Handy
reviews.comment: I use it every day for many settings and other features. Straightforward, not beautiful, but is hidden till you need it and gets the job done. Curious about battery drain (but haven\'t noticed issues). Fine app.
reviews.author: David Cohen

reviews.title: Constantly Freezing
reviews.comment: Latest update is causing the app to freeze every time it\'s started. Essentially useless the way it is now. 4.1 jelly bean.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome but small issue
reviews.comment: Great for changing settings quickly. One small problem is that the app does not recognize the size of my microsd. It says I only have 3.4 gb available when I actually have about 45/60 gb available on my sd. I\'ve tried reinstalling and no change. I\'m using a galaxy note 2.
reviews.author: Michael Perry

reviews.title: Difficult to use
reviews.comment: I can\'t move the widgets on the first screen but I can on the second. Weird.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ringer & Notif Now Merged?
reviews.comment: The app just took a giant leap backwards. Android JB now merges the Ring and Notif, but that WAS one of the great things about this app - it previously separated them. One of the recent updates removed this feature. JB Fail!
reviews.author: A Google User
